name: Woodways
description: A puzzle game in which you guide quirky animals through portals in the woods. But watch your step, they all move at once!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: SSE2 instruction set support CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB VRAM (Shader Model 4.0 or higher) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 450 MB available space
